@Phantom_generator_2D/hexgrid.m

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 % ======================================================================
00002 %> @brief Hexgrid generates list of nodes of hexagonal grid 
00003 %>
00004 %> @param x0 x position of grid center, (x,0) - center of image
00005 %> @param y0 y position of grid center, (0,y) - center of image
00006 %> @param sizeX x side size of image [mm]
00007 %> @param sizeY y side size of image [mm]
00008 %> @param d  diameter of (node) circle 
00009 %> @param D  node size 
00010 %> @param ang1 grid rotation
00011 %> @param ang2 not for use, should be 0
00012 %>
00013 %> @retval X,Y  cartesian coordinates of nodes
00014 %> @retval W,H  node width and height (= diameter of circle)
00015 %> @retval A,R  polar coordinates of nodes
00016 % =====================================================================
00017 function [X Y W H A R] = hexgrid(phobj,x0,y0,sizeX,sizeY,d,D,ang1,ang2)
00018 
00019 %liczenie wektorów siatki
00020 [v1(2),v1(1)] = pol2cart(mod(ang1,60)*2*pi/360,D);
00021 [v2(2),v2(1)] = pol2cart((mod(ang1,60)+60+(mod(ang2,60)))*2*pi/360,D);
00022 
00023 %generacja siatki kó³
00024 
00025 ind = 1;
00026 for i=1:1:sizeX/D
00027     for j=0:1:sizeY/D
00028         x = i*v1(1) + j*v2(1);
00029         y = i*v1(2) + j*v2(2);
00030         [a r] = cart2pol(x,y);
00031         %if x<sizeX/2 && y<sizeY/2 && x>-sizeX/2 && y>-sizeY/2
00032         if r<(sizeX/2-d/2)
00033             X(ind) = x;
00034             Y(ind) = y;
00035             W(ind) = d;
00036             H(ind) = d;
00037             A(ind) = a;
00038             R(ind) = r;
00039             ind = ind + 1;
00040         end
00041     end
00042     for j=-1:-1:-2*sizeY/D
00043         x = i*v1(1) + j*v2(1);
00044         y = i*v1(2) + j*v2(2);
00045         [a r] = cart2pol(x,y);
00046         %if x<sizeX/2 && y<sizeY/2 && x>-sizeX/2 && y>-sizeY/2
00047         if r<(sizeX/2-d/2)
00048             X(ind) = x;
00049             Y(ind) = y;
00050             W(ind) = d;
00051             H(ind) = d;
00052             A(ind) = a;
00053             R(ind) = r;
00054             ind = ind + 1;
00055         end
00056     end
00057 end
00058 for i=0:-1:-sizeX/D
00059     for j=0:1:sizeY/D
00060         x = i*v1(1) + j*v2(1);
00061         y = i*v1(2) + j*v2(2);
00062         [a r] = cart2pol(x,y);
00063         %if x<sizeX/2 && y<sizeY/2 && x>-sizeX/2 && y>-sizeY/2
00064         if r<(sizeX/2-d/2)
00065             X(ind) = x;
00066             Y(ind) = y;
00067             W(ind) = d;
00068             H(ind) = d;
00069             A(ind) = a;
00070             R(ind) = r;
00071             ind = ind + 1;
00072         end
00073     end
00074     for j=-1:-1:-2*sizeY/D
00075         x = i*v1(1) + j*v2(1);
00076         y = i*v1(2) + j*v2(2);
00077         [a r] = cart2pol(x,y);
00078         %if x<sizeX/2 && y<sizeY/2 && x>-sizeX/2 && y>-sizeY/2
00079         if r<(sizeX/2-d/2)
00080             X(ind) = x;
00081             Y(ind) = y;
00082             W(ind) = d;
00083             H(ind) = d;
00084             A(ind) = a;
00085             R(ind) = r;
00086             ind = ind + 1;
00087         end
00088     end
00089    
00090 end
